actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income certain savings bonds received by an employee as a service award, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income, for income tax and social security tax purposes, U.S. savings bonds received by an employee in recognition of achievement. Limits the exclusion to $250 ($500 in the case of a joint return filed by married individuals).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income certain savings bonds received by an employee as a service award, and for other purposes.
